thought: To achieve the user requirement, I need to define the trigger for manual trigger and the necessary actions: reading from Google Sheets, calling AI Completion for classification, and sending messages to Slack.
plan: Define action to read rows from Google Sheets with specified documentId and sheetName.
Define action to call AI Completion with messages input.
Define action to send messages to Slack channel #general.
criticism: Currently no functions are defined. Defining these functions is essential before implementation.
